item.title: Air Con: $1697 for an on/off switch
item.description: Forcing customers to replace an entire system just because the cheapest component failed might be really profitable, I have no idea… But I do know that it annoyed me enough to make me want to fix it myself. While I understand that what I do next is beyond a large number of Advantage Air customers, in my investigation I found that there seems to be only software choices preventing modern tablets from working with older control systems.

item.title: How You Should Keep Score in Pickup Basketball - Bryan Shalloway's Blog
item.description: TLDR: For full court pickup basketball you should play by 2s and 3s. Make-it-take-it by 1s and 2s is also fine. Adapt your game according to the scoring and possession system in place.

item.title: Regrets of the Dying – Bronnie Ware
item.description: For many years I worked in palliative care. My patients were those who had gone home to die. Some incredibly special times were shared. I was with them for the last three to twelve weeks of their lives.

item.title: The Beauty Of Having A Pi-hole

item.title: How we cut token count by 11% and boosted success rate by 3.9% by using HTML instead of JSON in our LLM calls
item.description:
TL;DR
We started using HTML instead of JSON to represent possible actions that Skyvern could take and reduced our cost by 11.8% and increased our success rate by 3.9%
What’s Skyvern?
Skyvern is an open source AI agent that helps companies automate browser-based workflows with AI.
item.author: (Suchintan Singh)
